import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-del-employee', templateUrl: './show-del.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-del.component.css'] }) export class ShowDelEmployeeComponent { constructor(private apiService: SharedService){ } emplist: any = []; refreshEmpList(){ this.apiService.GetEmployeeList().subscribe(res =>{ this.emplist = res; }, error => { } ) } }
